verses.verse: <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> the <S%G5550>times<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2540>seasons<s%>, <S%G80>brothers<s%>, you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> that I write <S%G1125>to<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> you <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G199>perfectly<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G2812>thief<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3571>night<s%>.

<S%G5210>You<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G5457>light<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of the <S%G2250>day<s%>: we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> of the <S%G3571>night<s%>, <S%G3761>nor<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2518>they<s%> that <S%G2518>sleep<s%> <S%G2518>sleep<s%> in the <S%G3571>night<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3184>they<s%> that are <S%G3182>drunk<s%> are <S%G3184>drunk<s%> in the <S%G3571>night<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3525>let<s%> <S%G2249>us<s%>, who <S%G5607>are<s%> of the <S%G2250>day<s%>, be <S%G3525>sober<s%>, putting <S%G1746>on<s%> the <S%G2382>breastplate<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> for a <S%G4030>helmet<s%>, the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G4991>salvation<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> we <S%G2065>beg<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G80>brothers<s%>, to <S%G1492>know<s%> them which <S%G2872>labor<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G4291>over<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3560>admonish<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>;

<S%G1161>Now<s%> we <S%G3870>exhort<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G80>brothers<s%>, <S%G3560>warn<s%> them that <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G813>unruly<s%>, <S%G3888>comfort<s%> the <S%G3642>feebleminded<s%>, <S%G472>support<s%> the <S%G772>weak<s%>, be <S%G3114>patient<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> all <S%G3956>men<s%>.

<S%G3708>See<s%> that <S%G3361>none<s%> <S%G591>render<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G473>for<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> unto <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G235>man<s%>; but <S%G3842>ever<s%> <S%G1377>follow<s%> that which is <S%G18>good<s%>, <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G240>yourselves<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5100>men<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G37>sanctify<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3651>wholly<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> I pray God <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3648>whole<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> be <S%G5083>preserved<s%> <S%G274>blameless<s%> <S%G1722>unto<s%> the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

I <S%G3726>command<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> by the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G314>that<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G1992>letter<s%> be <S%G314>read<s%> unto <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G80>brothers<s%>.

The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>. <S%G2331>Amen<s%>. The first letter unto the Thessalonians was written from Athens.
